title: BUGSPLAT LEAVER BUSTER
body:
So I went to play a game with my friend, "Relax I DoThis" and when we were loading into the game, I got a bugsplat. I tried to reconnect again, but the game wouldn't load and I didn't get a second bugsplat. I waited and waited for about 5 minutes to see if something would happen, but it didn't. So I closed league via task manager since it wouldn't let me close it through right click on icon and there was no x since it was loading screen. I open league back up, sign in, and then it said that the game was a remake and that i was put into low priority que (I had to wait 20 minutes before going into the que for 5 games) I have yet to play any of those five games in hopes that I can be unbanned. I submitted a report in "Ask Riot" under "Technical Issue" however I do not know if that was the correct place to submit it, or if it was the correct catagory to submit it as. I also did not submit the bugsplat as I figured it would fix itself as it has in the past. Please tell me if there is the possibility of being unbanned and if I needed to submit the bugsplat in order to be valid for future reference. Thank you for your time and your feed back will be much appreciated. <3.  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I was to laziy to actually change the body of the paragraph lol, so ignore the thing about where i should place it.

replies.body: happened to me aswell this was bullshit it would let you reconnect at all

Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts *everyone in the match*, which is a key reason why they're all treated equally and why we cannot remove penalties. Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I recommend waiting for a tech specialist to pick it up and work with you on resolving this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
